mapper.insert: INSERT INTO HOME( ID, CONTRACT, SIZE, ROOM, DEPOSIT, RENTAL_FEE, FLOOR, BUILDING, MANAGE_FEE, CONTRACT_DATE) VALUES ( #{id}, #{contract}, #{size}, #{room}, #{deposit}, #{rentalFee}, #{floor}, #{building}, #{manageFee}, #{contractDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE HOME SET CONTRACT = #{contract}, SIZE = #{size}, ROOM = #{room}, DEPOSIT = #{deposit}, RENTAL_FEE = #{rentalFee}, FLOOR = #{floor}, BUILDING = #{building}, MANAGE_FEE = #{manageFee}, CONTRACT_DATE = #{contractDate} WHERE ID = #{id}
